name: Ring
description: An emerald ring glows within a decorative jewelry box. The Ring card suggests both a promise and the honor involved in keeping it.

person.upright: Someone scrupulously faithful to a promise.
person.reverse: A person who resents being bound to an oath sworn in haste or duress.

creatureTrap.upright: A creature that has promised to serve someone.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature unwillingly bound to serve someone (such as an invisible stalker).

place.upright: A place where oaths are sworn, such as a temple or courthouse.
place.reverse: A place where a legendary figure was coerced into swearing an oath that led to their downfall.

treasure.upright: A ring, either jewelry or a magic item.

situation.upright: A situation complicated by a person's promise to do something.
situation.reverse: A situation arising from someone trying to abjure an oath.
